Class Shark

java.lang.Object
Shark
public class Shark extends Object
Class which stores information of any loans the player creates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Shark()
    Default constructor which to create objects derived from the Shark class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createLoan​(int loanValue)
    Creates a new loan, adding the amount to the loanValues array and adding a new turn value to the loanTurns array.Both the turnLoan and totalLoan variables are increased.
    void
    decreaseLoanTurn()
    Checks if any loans are present, then decreases each value in the loan turns array by 1 (triggered at the end of each round).
    void
    decreaseTotalLoan​(int amount)
    Decreases the balance of the totalLoan variable.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shark

      public Shark()
      Default constructor which to create objects derived from the Shark class.

  • Method Details

    • createLoan

      public void createLoan​(int loanValue)
      Creates a new loan, adding the amount to the loanValues array and adding a new turn value to the loanTurns array.Both the turnLoan and totalLoan variables are increased.
      Parameters:
      loanValue - int value representing the value of the new loan.

    • decreaseLoanTurn

      public void decreaseLoanTurn()
      Checks if any loans are present, then decreases each value in the loan turns array by 1 (triggered at the end of each round).

    • decreaseTotalLoan

      public void decreaseTotalLoan​(int amount)
      Decreases the balance of the totalLoan variable.
      Parameters:
      amount - int value representing the amount to reduce the totalLoan value by..

    • dueRepayment

      public int dueRepayment()
      This method iterates through the loanTurns array, checking if any are equal to zero. If they are they are removed & the index is removed from the loanValues array.
      Returns:
      int value representing the total grossed up amount to be removed from the players fish balance

    • getLoanTurns

      public ArrayList getLoanTurns()
      Accessor method for the loan turns array list.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of integer representing the turns remaining for each loan.

    • getLoanValues

      public ArrayList getLoanValues()
      Accessor method for the loan values array list.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of integer representing the non grossed up loan values for each loan.

    • getTotalLoan

      public int getTotalLoan()
      Accessor method for the totalLoan variable.
      Returns:
      int value representing the total outstanding fish borrowed.

    • getTurnLoan

      public int getTurnLoan()
      Accessor method for the turnLoan variable.
      Returns:
      int value representing the amount borrowed this turn.

    • loanDue

      public boolean loanDue()
      Checks if any current loans withing the loanTurns array equals 0 (meaning they are due)
      Returns:
      Boolean representing if any loans are due (true) or not (false).

    • repayAllLoans

      public int repayAllLoans()
      Used in story mode to repay all outstanding loans
      Returns:
      int value representing the total grossed up amount to be deducted from the players fish balane.

    • setLoanTurns

      public void setLoanTurns​(ArrayList<Integer> turns)
      Mutator method for the loanTurns array.
      Parameters:
      turns - ArrayList of Integer representing loan turns remaining until due.

    • setLoanValues

      public void setLoanValues​(ArrayList<Integer> values)
      Mutator method for the loanValues array.
      Parameters:
      values - ArrayList of Integer representing the individual loans outstanding.

    • setTotalLoan

      public void setTotalLoan​(int loan)
      Mutator method for the totalLoan variable.
      Parameters:
      loan - int representing the total outstanding loan for the player (not grossed up).

    • setTurnLoan

      public void setTurnLoan​(int loan)
      Mutator method for the turnLoan variable.
      Parameters:
      loan - int representing the total borrowed this turn for the player (not grossed up).
